step_feedback.feedback: Your arm was mostly straight overhead, but try to feel a bit more resistance. Keep your palm and fingers wide open.
You made a good fist while inhaling and tightening your muscles. Ensure you're fully extending your fingers and relaxing when exhaling.
You opened your hand well while exhaling and relaxing. Continue to visualize fluid being pumped out of your arm.
You successfully made a fist while inhaling and tightening. Remember to fully relax and open your hand on the exhale.

exercise_summary: Great job with the overhead pumping! Focus on stretching your arm fully overhead and making a tight fist as you inhale. Remember to relax and open your hand completely as you exhale to help move fluid.
